prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with elegant wings and a slender body.
I want a creature that embodies speed and grace, with a shimmering appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that has a humanoid shape, with a focus on agility.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing its beauty.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that combines elegance and fierce combat capabilities.
Design a mythical creature that has a delicate yet powerful presence.
Give me a Pokemon that stands out with bright colors and intricate features.
